ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In fact those who are kafir say that it is lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Instead, the unbelievers reject it, calling it a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In fact, they reject the Quran,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In fact the disbelievers keep denying.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! those who disbelieve give the lie to the truth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Nay, but the unbelievers are crying lies,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Nay, but those who disbelieve will deny;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, those who are bent on denying the truth reject it --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But on the contrary the Unbelievers reject (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, (on the contrary), those who disbelieve, belie (Prophet Muhammad (Peace be upon him) and whatever he brought, i.e. this Quran and Islamic Monotheism, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In fact, those who disbelieve are in denial.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But those who have disbelieved deny,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:22] Nay, but the disbelievers deny, resurrection and other matters,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Nay, but those who disbelieve) the disbelievers of Mecca and those among the sons of 'Abd Yalayl who did not believe (will deny) will disbelieve in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an;
